ModMetaData.name: Hospitality: Vending machines
ModMetaData.author: Adamas
ModMetaData.description: Adds a vending machine, and a fridge vending machine if rimfridge or simple fridge is installed. Guests can buy items here, and you can roughly set a pricing strategy. It fills the gap between the hospitality shopping area and the hospitality storefront. A vending machine requires a small bit of electricity. It requires you to research Complex Furniture.
